thread.title: Victim's father attacks Larry Nassar in court

title: Victim's father attacks Larry Nassar in court
text:
Victim's father attacks Larry Nassar in court 10:45am EST - 01:39 
The enraged father of three daughters sexually abused by Larry Nassar lunged at the former USA Gymnastics national team doctor during a sentencing hearing. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The enraged father of three daughters sexually abused by Larry Nassar lunged at the former USA Gymnastics national team doctor during a sentencing hearing. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2nCiKrk
